Store: NexMe
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 3.94 x 2.24 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Green-0A', 'UPC': '799904487696'}
Review Text: I thought this vibrated as well, but what you see is what you get. It comes with a head and replacement head with covers for easy storing. A nice way to apply my moisturizer.

reference_summary:
FILMIA Pink Wig Long Pink Wig Pastel Pink Curly Body Wave Wig for Halloween Csotume, Cosplay Parties or Daily Use --23.6inch FILMIA {'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'FILMIA', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult'} What a fun wig! It’s very bouncy and not too heavy. Also a plus that the wig is ready to wear and you don’t need to trim any of the front pieces. Great Quality 4240Pcs Flatback White Opal Rhinestones Glass Crystal Gemstones for Nail Art Face Makeup Glitter Round with Tweezers and Picking Pen (SS6~SS20 Set) MEIBITE {'Brand': 'MEIBITE', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Item Form': 'Pen', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Crafts, Nail Arts, Arts', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 4.33 x 0.59 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '749666774886'} Had to knock some stars off because of the poor packaging. Yes, you get tons of rhinestones… so much that I guess it popped off the lid. Thankfully it was enclosed in another packaging. I spent about an hour with tweezers putting the sizes back in the correct spots. Lots of rhinestones but… L’ANGE HAIR Pocket Size Comb | Blush Acetate | Compact Design for Travel | Easy Glide Mini Wide Tooth Comb L'ANGE HAIR {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Dry', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3.63 x 0.25 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2438', 'UPC': '810108191001'} Everything about this pocket size comb is great. I love the pearl pink color and the comb itself is nice and thick. Almost feels like it detangles my hair as I use it. The packaging was neat and the white pouch it comes in is bright white & soft. This will fit in any purse I choose to wear - big or small. Love this Comb! Professional Electric Nail Drill, Rechargeable 35000 RPM E-File Nail Drill Kit for Gel, Acrylic Nails, Manicure Pedicure Polishing Tools with 16 Pcs Bits, Great for Home or Salon (Black) PLIISLUP {'Brand': 'PLIISLUP', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Aluminum, Metal', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.8 x 2.7 x 0.9 inches', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Product Dimensions': '6.8 x 2.7 x 0.9 inches; 1.32 Pounds', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'Manufacturer': 'PLIISLUP'} I have recently decided to get into doing acrylics and was looking for a nail drill- I’m picky about getting items unless it’s quality AND aesthetically appealing..well, this one was both! Love the different pinks and the nail bits have been easy to figure out (comes with instructions) so far. The drill came nicely packaged and is quieter than any other drill I have heard. Great Nail Drill MilyBest Fluffy Lashes False Eyelashes Natural Look Cat Eye Lashes, Dramatic Faux Mink Lashes 3D Effect 18mm D Curl Volume Extension Reusable Wispy Lashes Pack 10 Pairs MilyBest {'Color': 'B-Sweet Date | 18MM', 'Brand': 'MilyBest', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'QC10-T02', 'Manufacturer': 'MilyBest', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} You get so many lashes for the price..these are fluffy and I like that there are different variations. I usually wear lashes with a clear band, so I will be using these for costumes and dramatic looks. The fit would be best on larger eyes, I have small eyes so I will be trimming these. Fluffy and Fun! L’ANGE HAIR Wide Tooth Comb Tortoiseshell Acetate | Lightweight, Smooth, Compact Design | Easy Glide Wide Tooth Comb L'ANGE HAIR {'Product Dimensions': '0.25 x 7 x 3.13 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2427', 'UPC': '810108190974'} L’ange is a company you can tell puts effort into the presentation of how they package all of their items. I like this comb and it’s convenient to travel with, however I do believe the price point is a little too much for this item. Great Travel Comb MEICOLY Fake Blood Washable,1.06oz Edible Stage Blood,Realistic Drips Sticky Fake Blood with Brush,Safe for Mouth,Teeth,Nosebleed,Halloween,Cosplay,SFX Makeup,Special Effects Cut Flesh Wound,Bright MEICOLY {'Color': '1.06 oz stage blood,bright', 'Brand': 'MEICOLY', 'Item Weight': '1.06 Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 1.18 inches; 1.06 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MEICOLY', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Great add on to any Halloween costume or one that you want to make more realistic. Can be used on face/body or as a prop on an object! Special FX must have, and it’s a decent size bottle! Can’t wait to have my looks come to life. Super MilyBest Fluffy Lashes False Eyelashes Natural Look Cat Eye Lashes, Dramatic Faux Mink Lashes 3D Effect 18mm D Curl Volume Extension Reusable Wispy Lashes Pack 10 Pairs MilyBest {'Color': 'B-Sweet Date | 18MM', 'Brand': 'MilyBest', 'Material': 'Faux Mink, Plastic, Cotton', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '7.44 x 4.02 x 0.69 inches; 0.32 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'QC10-T02', 'Manufacturer': 'MilyBest', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} If I could give these 6 stars I would! My first time ever wearing half lashes and my experience was

• forgot I was wearing lashes because they are so light
• incredibly easy for anyone to put on!
• no need to worry about the corners lifting up because it’s barely noticeable if they do
• wore comfortably for over 10 hours

What a great price for 10 lashes as well! These are perfect and I’ve already told so many people about them. In Love! BAR;SOO - Natural boar bristle paddle cushion hair brush for Thick Curly Thin Long Short hair, Detangle all types of hair, Hair loss prevention, Naturally glossy Hair (Purple/violet) BAR;SOO {'Brand': 'BAR;SOO', 'Color': 'Purple,Violet', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Nylon', 'Special Feature': 'Detangling', 'Package Dimensions': '10.83 x 5.59 x 2.01 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'Country of Origin': 'Korea, Republic of'} Great paddle brush! Love the color and the feel of the brush… it’s smooth and comfortable in my hand. De-tangles my hair with ease! Wonderful! 8 Sheets Skull Nail Art Stickers 3D Self-Adhesive Acrylic Nail Kit Designs Charms Nail Stickers Heart Skull Snake Black Nail Sticker Designer Nail Art Supplies for Women DIY Nail Decoration LRKNNO {'Brand': 'LRKNNO', 'Color': 'Flame', 'Surface Recommendation': 'Nail', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Theme': 'Skull', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Installation Type': 'Self-Adhesive', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Pattern': 'Variety Pack', 'Shape': 'Heart', 'Package Dimensions': '5.75 x 4.06 x 0.16 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} What a great deal for all the stickers & sheets you receive! I peeled them off with my fingers, but they come off easier with tweezers. I tried out a sticker on my bare nail with no clear coat and it’s stayed on for over 24hrs! Very nice quality of stickers and so many options! Love! BLAISTER Headbands for Women knotted Head Bands Fashion Boho Hair Bands Hair Hoops Women Headbands Hair Accessories 4 Pcs (knot colourful) BLAISTER {'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Brand': 'BLAISTER', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 4.9 x 2.2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '614614988069'} These headbands were nicer than I expected, and best part not tight on my head! A lot of times headbands are tighter on my head, but these fit perfectly. I was worried the knot on the top would look funny on my head/bulky… but it actually looks cute! Nice! 3 PCS Bracelet Hair Ties With Black Elastic, Hair Ties Bracelet for Women, Looks Awesome On Your Wrist and Great In Your Hair GMaxit {'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Nylon, Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'GMaxit', 'Number of Pieces': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '3.66 x 3.43 x 0.43 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '799904486361'} One of the hair ties silver part is a little sharp. Not sure these will be able to wrap around my hair multiple times. Might stick to using them as bracelets. Cute Ice Roller For Face | Ice Roller, Face Roller, Ice Face Roller | Face Ice Roller, Face Roller Skin Care | Facial Roller, Ice Roller For Face & Eye Puffiness Relief | Facial Ice Eye Roller (Pink) Lexi White Beauty {'Package Dimensions': '7.83 x 3.58 x 2.36 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LW-ICE-RL'} Wow, this roller is huge! I like how easy it is to grip and comes with instructions. Lovely Ice Roller for Face & Eye, Face Roller with A Replaceable Head for Reducing Puffiness, Migraine, Pain Relief and Minor Injury NexMe {'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 3.94 x 2.24 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Green-0A', 'UPC': '799904487696'} I thought this vibrated as well, but what you see is what you get. It comes with a head and replacement head with covers for easy storing. A nice way to apply my moisturizer. Soothing
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** The user continues to embrace vibrant and playful accessories while now focusing on multifunctional beauty tools. Her recent purchase of a facial roller exemplifies her interest in stylish self-care items that provide convenience in her routine. 

- **Style Trends:** She maintains a strong inclination towards versatile products suited for themed events like Halloween and cosplay, showcasing her desire for personalized aesthetics that reflect her bold style. Her choice of multifunctional accessories underlines her creativity and practical approach to beauty.

- **Quality Appreciation:** The user places a high value on quality, evident in her selection of beauty tools. She prefers cruelty-free products with attractive packaging, weighing functionality heavily in her buying decisions. While her recent experience with a new beauty tool was mostly positive, she noted a slight misunderstanding regarding its features, indicating her focus on practicality without overlooking minor quality concerns.

- **Use Cases:** She seeks items that simplify her beauty routine while allowing for creative expression, emphasizing comfort for her active lifestyle. 

- **Overall Experience:** With an eye for detail, she is drawn to aesthetically pleasing products that enhance her beauty rituals. Her reviews reflect a blend of playfulness and practicality as she navigates innovative options to inspire creativity and fulfill her beauty needs.
